pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multispectral Data Analysis and Visualization // Provides tools for processing, analyzing, and visualizing spectral data collected from 3D laser-based scanning systems. Supports applications in agriculture, forestry, environmental monitoring, industrial quality control, and biomedical research. Enables evaluation of plant growth, productivity, resource efficiency, disease management, and pest monitoring. Includes statistical methods for extracting insights from multispectral and hyperspectral data and generating publication-ready visualizations. See Zieschank Junker (2023) doi:10.3389/fpls.2023.1141554 and Saric et al. (2022) doi:10.1016/J.TPLANTS.2021.12.003 for related work.
